file_content.text: I gotta find a new job. I knew I shouldn't have quit cooking school....
Heh, we're still pals, right? Heh....
Hey, did you deliver my package? I put a tracker in it so I'd know, but there's interference blockin' the signal.
You were spying on me?
Tracker?
I wasn't spying on you--I was spying on my package. Don't take things so personally.
Change of plans, Getzo.
Did somethin' go wrong with the bomb? I knew that Kubaz was sellin' shoddy goods!
Yeah, I dumped your pulse-bomb in the sewer.
I'll just bet.
What? Why would you do that?
Hey, what's that smuggler doin' here? What's goin' on?
You're messing with the wrong guy, spice-head. Time to find yourself a new hobby.
You double-crossed me!
This smuggler works for important people. You're out of your league.
Back off, Getzo.
Thanks for the news flash, but I'm figurin' that out all by myself!
He made me a better offer.
That's right.
Outbid me again? I'm gettin' an inferiority complex.
It was necessary.
I trusted you! What's this galaxy comin' to when criminals can't count on each other?
Oh, get over it.
I can't believe you did this to me. I thought we were pals!
Getzo, I've got a special one-time only offer: Back off or I'll make you eat your own eyeballs.
What? No! That's disgusting! You people are crazy!
You said you wouldn't kill him, remember?
Ease off, Nokril.
He'll live... just be blind with a bad case of indigestion.
I agree, that was pretty over-the-top.
I'm not, but he certainly is.
Just making my position clear. I don't want this poor scum any more confused than he already is.
Then don't mess with us.
Ooh, hear that? I'm all that stands between you and my bloodthirsty new friend, here.
I'm done, all right? I won't mess with you again! Just don't hurt me!
Who says there are no happy endings? Thanks for the assist. Here's your payment, just like I promised.
I need to get back to the bargaining table. I'll be keeping an eye on you, Getzo.
I... I won't do nothin'. I swear.
Good boy.
Welcome back! I put a tracker in my package so I'd know you dropped it off. I'm about to fry those eels good.
That smuggler you're messing with works for the Empire.
We may have a problem.
Not for long. When I blow his deal with Nem'ro, he's gonna have a lot of explainin' to do.
Is that it?
I got a remote switch to trip the pulse-bomb so's I don't even have to leave the palace. Convenient, huh?
You were tracking me, you little cheat?
Tracker?
Hey, I just needed to know when the package was delivered. My business is time-sensitive.
Here we go... three, two, one, zap! No more eels. All that's left is for us to settle up.
I'm very good with numbers. Don't try to shortchange me.
Count every credit.
What have I done to make you think I'm an untrustworthy guy? Aside from the bombing.
Hurry up and hand them over. I need new gear.
Then start counting credits.
Already burnin' a hole in your pocket, huh?
I do love money.
Maybe you should buy some spice to celebrate, heh....
What about hazard pay?
I see you feel strongly about this. Sure, what's a few extra credits between friends?
Now your old pal Getzo can get back to doin' what he does best: makin' the galaxy a happy place.
Here you go. Paid in full, bonus included. See you around, killer.
Enjoy these credits. If you're ever in the market for some spice, I'll be around.
The smuggler's still jawin' with Nem'ro's spice dealers. Go fry his crate of eels while he's busy.
Hey there, I'm Getzo. Whatcha in the market for? Glitterstim? Novajack? Corellian Sunburst? I invented all those spices. Ask anybody.
You meet the most interesting people in Hutt palaces.
You're quite a character.
Ain't it the truth? I'm a spice artisan, friend. People pay big credits for my special blends.
Are you in business with Nem'ro?
What are you doing here?
Kinda. When spice is your game, you gotta play with the Hutts.
That junk kills. You got a death wish, pal?
Spice is bad for you.
You mean a Doom Desire? Sorry, I'm all out of that flavor.
How much to buy all three of those spices?
I'm in the market for spice.
Most days you'd get a bulk discount--but the fact is, I'm fresh out of everything.
Listen, I been watchin' people come and go. You're the most excitin' person to come through all day. We should be workin' together.
I was buyin' a spice shipment from Nem'ro when some laser-brained smuggler outbid me. The smuggler offered up Nem'ro's favorite snack--Adegan eels.
Nem'ro's trading spice for snacks?
Adegan eels?
Those eels are rare--somethin' he can lord over the other Hutts. It's a status thing.
What do you know about this smuggler?
Smuggler, hmm?
Nothin'. The guy's a nobody.
Get your own eels or find another spice supplier.
I don't see the problem.
No time. I got a lot of impatient customers waiting.
This just isn't your day.
Thanks for the sympathy. Luckily, I'm not lookin' for a shoulder to cry on.
Word is, the smuggler keeps the Adegan eels in a water-filled crate while he and Nem'ro negotiate.
I got an electromagnetic pulse-bomb that'll boil those eels to a crisp. All's I need is someone to plant the bomb.
How does this device of yours work?
Pulse-bomb?
When I transmit a signal, the bomb explodes with electric current. Fries everything.
Why not nab the eels and give them to Nem'ro yourself?
Is that the best plan?
The crate is huge. It's heavier than Nem'ro after a week-long binge.
You've thought this through.
I know, right? It's not just a job, it's a chance for some laughs.
With the eels gone, Nem'ro sells the spice to me instead. Whaddaya say? Wanna earn some fast credits?
Fast credits are my favorite kind.
You said the magic word.
I'm in.
Sorry, I have more important business.
No thanks.
Aw, come on! It's easy money. You know you wanna do this.
You're quite a salesman, Getzo. Give me the bomb.
I suppose I do, at that.
Fine, if it'll shut you up.
Great! I knew we could do business.
The smuggler's got a hideout here in town. Plant the pulse-bomb on the eel crate and hurry back.
Wrong. [Refuse quest]
Can't blame me for tryin', right? You change your mind, come see me.
'Scuse me, but I'm waiting to meet with Nem'ro. Got me a spice deal to close. Big money, heh....
